name: The Suicide Room
description:
For those who still have hope.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is just a short little vent game. I made it so if I get the feeling I could just play this. 

Controls:

WASD - To Move

Left Mouse - To grab

Right Mouse - To drop

Esc - Quit Application

After you go into the first room, you will start sliding when you come back again. My best advice is to slide into the door.

Music Credits:

Sigur Rós: Ekki múkk (moving art)

0 People's Waltz

GPS _ nakano4

Harmful Logic - Dance Of Death

【ゆめにっき】ひねくれネジと雨【手描きMAD】中文字幕

мы — возможно
